sentences.sentence: It happened on Dec 27, 2019 in Wenchang, Hainan.

sentences.sentence: Dec. 16 this Sunday night (6:30 p.m. to 8:30 p.m.), is a good chance to watch the football game in our City Gym this year.
sentences.translation: 12月16日本周日晚上（下午6点半至8点半），是今年在我市体育馆观看足球比赛的好机会。
